RelevantChangelogs.Description: Updates endpoint to support gateway replace.
RelevantChangelogs.Details: Adds a gatewaySerial field to allow customers to replace the connected gateway to their vehicle. Gateway needs to be activated on the same organization already. Deactivates the gateway previously linked.
